Vigilance, trample, haste
[i]Noble Decree[/i] – Whenever Ferdinand, of House Aegir attacks with two or more other creatures, create a 5/5 red and white Knight creature token with vigilance, trample, and haste, for each opponent that is attacking them.
[i]Spear of Assal[/i] – Creatures and nonbasic lands your opponents control enter tapped.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {4}{R}{W}
